entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight then light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
